name: Yeah, She Doesn't Live in Heaven Anymore
name_original: Yeah, She Doesn't Live in Heaven Anymore
description:
She heard her lost siblings and friends calls, now she must go to the tower and save them. She must willingly give up her ability to return to heaven, in exchange she can return them to heaven.

Will you make your sacrifice worth its weight?

Controls:
Left/Right - Run to the left or right
Up - Jump and wall jump
Space - Quick slash

Made for the GameMaker Community's 46th game jam.
